articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT $MIGUEL Piedrafita (🫐, 🫐)
When I was learning Solidity, I remember feeling like there were no good resources to go beginner ➡️ intermediate
To continue learning, I built simplified versions of popular apps (ENS, OpenSea, Gnosis, ...)
Might be helpful for those on the path now 👇 https://github.com/m1guelpf/lil-web3

Once again I'm asking for your support on @womenbuildweb3's gitcoin grant 🫶
A $1 (yes, one) contribution gets matched at $283. The more contributors we have, the better match rate we're awarded. Fund engineering projects by sick devs 👀 https://gitcoin.co/grants/6100/women-build-web3-developer-accelerator

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Devin Abbott
What's the use case for web3 beyond NFT/crypto speculation?
Geo, hopefully, is one answer to that question. Created by @edgeandnode and powered by @graphprotocol, it also fits my vision of web3 as backend infrastructure for apps. Here's why https://medium.com/@devinabbott/meet-geo-a-browser-for-web3-content-and-my-vision-for-web3-as-backend-infrastructure-for-apps-3b0cef1d7a0

articles.description:
🔥 lit 🔥
Lit Protocol: 🔥 New Post 🔥
Learn how to encrypt data using @LitProtocol, upload it to @ArweaveTeam using @BundlrNetwork, then have another user who meets access control conditions fetch  and decrypt using Lit!
 https://blog.litprotocol.com/?p=lit-x-bundlr-x-arweave-guide

Hey folks please help Solana and commit to the Solana StackExchange today

This is our last chance! https://area51.stackexchange.com/proposals/126615

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT GraphOps | graphops.eth
We're hiring TypeScript Engineers, Rust Engineers & Designers 🎉
Come join us:
The Graph: The Graph core devs continue to grow! 👩‍🚀
As just announced by @evabeylin at #GraphDay2022, a $12M grant has been awarded to @graphopsxyz, a longstanding contributor & Indexer, to provide core research & development in The Graph ecosystem! 🧵
articles.title: RT GraphOps | graphops.eth: We're hiring TypeScript Engineers, Rust Engineers & Designers 🎉 Come join us:
Full Stack Web3 with Lens Protocol, Next.js, and GraphQL - Building a Social Media App
